Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

note: Husband, friend, motorcyclist, technologist. He/Him. #FBPE #FBPA

Joined Mastodon in 2020. Working in finance but would happily retire and enjoy long walks, cooking and being a cat slave. Have enjoyed plenty of travel and have been so damn lucky to have lived in the far East, Hong Kong and Middle East, Kuwait. Love spicy food and enjoy a pint now and again. Proud mother of 2 & grandma to 4. Life needs a good balance and the UK is in an extreme imbalance right now. Not a fan of Tories, Brexit, racists and the terminally stupid. Save our NHS.. #RejoinEU #FBPE

Member of Liverpool City council for 40 years and councillor for the world famous Penny Lane Ward. Lord Mayor of Liverpool, chair of LAMIT, the Local Authority Mutual Investment Trust. Chair of QS Impact. Husband of the lovely Alderman Erica Kemp CBE, Dad to 3 and Grandpa to 5.

I won't forgive liars, cheats, hypocrites or chancers who have knowingly made our lives worse, for their own gain.

I am intolerant of people that use the word Woke as a criticism. All it means is Considerate.

I am intolerant of Tory enablers who know their own interests are best served by voting to get them out, even if they have to hold their noses.

My top tags are #FBPE #FBPA #FBPPR #GTTO
